data.name: Tidewoken
data.detailed_description:
Tidewoken is a multiplayer turn-based tactics dungeon-crawler. Make your own team of characters and learn new skills to find the strongest combinations, outsmart your opponents, and beat challenging dungeons. Tidewoken combines many layers like theory-crafting, tactical gameplay, impactful positioning, and team-building.

Adventure through the dungeons alone and with your friends, or engage in meaningful battles against other players.

Replayability

Each character is able to equip up to 12 skills, including a legendary skill, and 4 perks. Every skill in Tidewoken is unique and offers a variety of uses, combo potentials, and synergy with other skills and effects.

Character perks range from basic beneficial effects like bonus damage, to more complex buffs, affecting your entire playstyle.

Dungeons

Explore new monsters and bosses with up to 4 players in co-op dungeons. Easier difficulties allow you to have a fun and casual experience together, while the hardest difficulty is reserved for well-prepared teams. Players who rather enjoy the dungeons on their own can take up to 4 characters with them, or choose from AI-controlled companions.

Each dungeon features one or more bosses with demanding and fun behaviors. Combined with the vast amount of skills, each playthrough is a unique experience.

Core features:

  • Dungeons - Each dungeon has multiple rooms and monsters with distinctive behaviors. Bring up to 3 other players with you, or try to beat them alone.
  • In-depth character editor - We love replayability. With hundreds of different skills, 4 classes, and additional perks we ensure that every match is a unique experience.
  • Competitive PvP - Everything in Tidewoken is centered around a fair and competitive match. No luck-based values, no random effects, 100% pure skill.
  • Measure your plays - All important actions are logged into the combat log. View the impact of your damage, healing, and protection in the detailed scoreboard.
  • Handcrafted maps - Although our focus is on gameplay, we're working hard to provide beautiful visuals and environments to enjoy.
  • Progression - Gain experience and earn Twokens from fights and achievements to unlock new skills, perks, cosmetics, and more.
  • Matchmaking - 1 vs 1 matchmaking is supported on launch, with more gamemodes being added later.

data.short_description: A turn-based multiplayer dungeon-crawler with theory-crafting elements. Tidewoken includes hundreds of skills, 4 classes, and more than 30 perks, allowing the creation of thousands of unique characters. Adventures through multiple dungeons, each with its own monsters and challenging bosses.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4570 or AMD Ryzen™ 7 2700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 980 GTX or AMD Radeon™ RX 590
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
